entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13.
